Returns: ObbInfo object information corresponding to the file path
Parameters: String: path to the OBB file to be scanned.
Throws: if the OBB file couldn't be found
if the OBB file couldn't be read
getObbInfo(java.lang.String).Description: Scan a file for OBB information.

ClassDesc: Class to scan Opaque Binary Blob (OBB) files. Use this to get information about an OBB file for use in a program via @B_android#content#res#ObbInfo_E@.
